item.title: Eli add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "I've had a perfectly wonderful evening, but this wasn't it." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Eli add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "There's a bluebird in my heart that wants to get out but I'm too tough for him, I say, stay in there, I'm not going to let anybody see you." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Eli add a quote by Stephen Crane
Eli add a quote by Roberto Bolano
item.description: "Books are finite, sexual encounters are finite, but the desire to read and to fuck is infinite; it surpasses our own deaths, our fears, our hopes for peace." -- Roberto Bolano
